question:
With reference to recent plans to set up the first university for transgender persons in India, consider the following statements:
  1. The university is to include school level education also.
  2. It is to be set up in Uttar Pradesh.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Â Statement 1 is correct: The university is to provide school level education also to the transgender community. They will be able to learn from class I to post- graduation in this institution. Provisions for doing research and getting Ph.D. are also to be included. Statement 2 is correct: The university is to be established in Kushinagar in Uttar Pradesh. This is the first such educational institution for the community in India. It is to be set up by the All India Transgender Education Service Trust. The institution is expected to start functioning from 2020 onwards.
